body:
Hi Maverick,

Can you upload an example IES definition that doesn't work for you? Current component doesn't support all available shapes. Also this file is old. Did you try the more updated version? Here is an example file: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/simulating-...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/simulating-ies-lamps-file-through-rad-materials?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1170056&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987)
